msg: change due to changes in trunk related to dealing with appliesTo attribute of PolicySet

author: svkrish
msg: added code for first reading the composites and adding a 'applicablePolicySets' attribute to sca artifacts for which policysets defined in the domain apply, after this adding read the composite model thro the StaxProcessor, then as usual resolve the policysets specified in the applicablePolicySets attribute.  When policysets are computed, they are validated against this list of applicablePolicySets
